actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to require certain States to contribute to other States' shares of cleanup costs.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to authorize a State in which a remedial action is being conducted at a hazardous waste facility to recover costs associated with such action from the State in which the waste was generated.

titles.title: To amend the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to require certain States to contribute to other States' shares of cleanup costs.
